mapper.insert: insert into cost (cost_id, name, base_duration, base_cost, unit_cost, status, descr, creat_time, start_time, cost_type) values (#{cost_id},#{name},#{base_duration},#{base_cost},#{unit_cost}, #{status},#{descr},#{creat_time},#{start_time},#{cost_type})
mapper.select: select cost_id, name, base_duration, base_cost, unit_cost, status, descr, creat_time, start_time, cost_type from cost
select * from (select c.*,rownum r from cost c where rownum < #{nextMin} )where r > #{lastMax}
select cost_id id, name,status,creat_time createTime from cost
